metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6173 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Incorrect handling of confusable characters in URL Formatter in Google Chrome prior to 68.0.3440.75 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via IDN homographs via a crafted domain name.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
